ip: (Hebrew ‘אִיּוֹב’ but commonly known via the Greek Ἰώβ (Iōb) as ‘Job’) is an account about a godly man who was struck by a series of tragedies: all his children and their families were killed, all his extensive wealth was lost, and then he was struck with a terrible disease. By means of this seven-part account, the reader is informed about how Iyyov and his friends react concerning those tragedies. Then finally, God reveals himself to Iyyov.
